document_data.name: Chezzara
document_data.Activities: Chezzara was one of the priestesses of the Misty Forest. She was a powerful healer, knowing well the [[Resurrection (spell)|resurrection spell]].
document_data.History:
Chezzara resurrected [[Rowaan Vrinn]] after her death at the hands of a large group of [[drider]]s.

She later tried to resurrect Rowaan again after she was killed by a [[nightshadow]] of [[Vhaeraun]], but with her soul stolen it was impossible for Chezzara to fulfill this the task.
